page.title: 18THORNTON PLANT NURSERY
page.content: The plant nursery has been in Thornton for 21 years.Mr.Smith the owner is a fuchsia expert growing 210 different types.In all,the nursery stocks approximately 200,000 plants,and 600 varieties.Mr.Smith has appeared on B.B.C.T.V."Gardeners World"and various radio programmes. In winter the green houses have to be kept at a temperature of 55 degrees f.during the day and 45 degrees at night.Every saturday he puts poison in the green house to kill the insects. Mr.Smith sells plants at B&Q Superstore and at Manchester and Birmingham markets. The nursery employs 3 people full time and 3 part time.Approximately 500 people visit the nursery each week.We think it is a lovely place to visit particulary with the reservoir across the road..
